fullText:
“Just check with everyone in your group: Some will be tickled pink by ‘The Cottage’ and thrill to the très outré comic stylings...Others will be ready to head to the basement bar at intermission to nurse their headache and remain there...All that said, given the givens, I still had several good laughs.”

Read more

llmScore.reasoning: Claude: The critic acknowledges strong polarization in audience response and personally found some enjoyment despite recognizing the show's divisive nature. | GPT-4o-mini: The review indicates mixed feelings, with some enjoyment but significant reservations about the overall experience.
